trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The big water slurpent is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: 如果大水蛇离开它所绑定的水，或者该水被破坏，它就会死亡。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6+3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and pulled 5 feet toward the big water slurpent. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the big water slurpent tries to drown it, and the big water slurpent can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Birdsquirrel has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Birdsquirrel's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 鸟类松鼠会进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6+2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4+2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Boontu monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the boontu monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 ‒1})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 人鱼族可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Siren Song
entries: 可爱的歌声迷住了300英尺内的每个人形或巨人。目标必须在一个{@dc 11}的智慧救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition charmed}，直到歌曲结束。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
footerEntries: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma
(spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 巫婆可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Mimicry (Green Hag)
entries: 巫婆可以模仿动物的声音和人类的声音。听到这些声音的生物可以通过成功的{@dc 14}智慧({@skill Insight})检查看出它们是模仿的。

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself with a magical illusion that allows her to look like another creature of her general size and shape. The illusion ends when the hag chooses, or if she dies. A {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check will expose the hag's disguise.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her {@status concentration} ends. While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, and can only be tracked by magic.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Catch me if you can!
entries: 达姆哥布林在战斗前会选择逃跑和躲藏 在他们被攻击之前，必须做一个{@dc 15}的灵巧检查。

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 +2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: 他们对毒药的救赎有优势，并且对毒药伤害有抵抗力。

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: 这种蠕虫能以一半的钻洞速度钻过坚硬的岩石，并在其身后留下一条直径为10英尺的隧道。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 该虫子进行了两次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14}击中，一个目标。{@h}22 ({@damage 3d8})穿刺伤害。目标必须做一个{@dc 19}灵巧的救赎，否则就会被虫子吞噬!

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14}击中，一个生物。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9})穿刺伤害 目标必须做一个{@dc 19}宪法救赎，否则受到42
({@dice 12d6})毒伤害。

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: Otyugh可以用魔法将简单的信息和图像传送给它周围120英尺内任何能理解语言的生物。这种形式的心灵感应并不允许接收的生物做出心灵感应。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥特尤格进行了三次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。目标必须做一个{@dc 15}体质救赎，否则会受到d
({@dice 1d10})中毒伤害，直到治愈。

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击伤害,目标必须做一个{@dc 19}体质救赎,否则会受到42%的伤害。
({@dice 12d6})毒药伤害

action.name: Slam
entries: 目标必须做一个{@dc 14}宪法保护，或被{@condition grappled}。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巨人进行了两次大环形攻击。

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5})重击伤害。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8}击中，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5})重击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 库阿特尔的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: 库拉图对窥探和任何能感知其情绪、读取其思想或探测其位置的效果都是免疫的。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 13}宪法救赎，否则会倒下{@condition unconscious}。另一个生物可以使用一个动作来摇醒目标。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个中型或小型生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})重击伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 15})。Couatl一次只能约束一个目标。

action.name: Change Shape
entries: 寇泰尔会神奇地多态化为一个挑战等级等于或小于它自己的人或野兽，或者回到它的真实形态。如果它死了，它就会恢复到它的真实形态。它所穿戴或携带的任何装备都会被新的形态所吸收或承担（由库拉特选择）。
在一个新的形态中，库拉图保留了它的游戏数据和说话的能力，但是它的攻击力、移动模式、力量、灵巧和其他动作都被新形态的动作所取代，并且它获得了新形态拥有但它缺乏的任何数据和能力（除了等级特征、传奇动作和巢穴动作）。如果新形态有咬合攻击，库拉图可以在该形态下使用它的咬合。
